body_html:
It may happen when you delete the previously defined model_dir in your Estimator configuration: FileWriter will fail to write in the deleted directory (even a directory with the same path is created).

You can use tf.summary.FileWriterCache.clear() to clear current cache if this happens. You will lose anterior cached summaries though.
body_text:
It may happen when you delete the previously defined model_dir in your Estimator configuration: FileWriter will fail to write in the deleted directory (even a directory with the same path is created).
You can use tf.summary.FileWriterCache.clear() to clear current cache if this happens. You will lose anterior cached summaries though.
body:
It may happen when you delete the previously defined `model_dir` in your `Estimator` configuration: `FileWriter` will fail to write in the deleted directory (even a directory with the same path is created).

You can use `tf.summary.FileWriterCache.clear()` to clear current cache if this happens. You will lose anterior cached summaries though.
